commands.name: index
commands.title: Upload Selected File
commands.description: Upload a file selected in Finder

commands.name: uploadFromClipboard
commands.title: Upload File from Clipboard
commands.description: Upload a file from clipboard (path or copied file)

commands.name: viewHistory
commands.title: View Upload History
commands.description: View and manage your uploaded files

commands.name: copyLastUploadURL
commands.title: Copy Last Upload URL
commands.description: Copy the URL of the most recently uploaded file

preferences.name: copyUrlToClipboard
preferences.title: Copy URL to Clipboard
preferences.description: Automatically copy URL to clipboard when an upload completes
preferences.label: Copy URL to Clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
